programs.title: IIC Quest 2.0
programs.description: IIC Quest is an flagship event organuized by Innovation Lab which iterates every year to bring together students, faculty, and industry professionals to explore and innovate in the world of Innovation and Creativity.

testimonials.name: Er. Santosh Parajuli
testimonials.quote: The Innovation Lab at Itahari International College is a hub for Collaboration, Research and Innovation. This space fosters problem-solving, entrepreneurship, and Creativity , preparing students for future challenges. It has greatly enhanced academic excellence while inspiring innovation-driven mindsets. I am proud to lead this initiative, shaping the next generation of innovators.

news.title: Innovation Lab Wins Excellence Award
news.excerpt: Our commitment to innovation and research has been recognized with the prestigious Excellence in Innovation Award.

news.title: New Research Partnership Announced
news.excerpt: We're excited to announce our new partnership with leading tech companies to advance AI research.

news.title: Student Project Receives Global Recognition
news.excerpt: Our student team's innovative solution for sustainable energy has gained international attention.
